E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Progress of Claudio Tello
Dear Sir,
Claudio Tello has an ERA of 2.61 at A Ft. Myers Miracle!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
